languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, обыск палат плазмадвигателя завершен, заговорщик схвачен и обезврежен. Приглашаю вас присутствовать на процедуре дознания".
"Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, обыск палат плазмадвигателя завершен, заговорщик схвачен и обезврежен. Приглашаю вас присутствовать на процедуре дознания".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."
"Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

"Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos registrado las cámaras del motor de plasma y hemos capturado y neutralizado al conspirador. El interrogatorio comenzará pronto, si mi{mf|lord|lady} está list{mf|o|a} para atender».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos registrado las cámaras del motor de plasma y hemos capturado y neutralizado al conspirador. El interrogatorio comenzará pronto, si mi{mf|lord|lady} está list{mf|o|a} para atender».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、プラズマドライブ室の場所を突き止めて、共謀犯を捕らえ、敵勢力を無力化しました。陛下の準備が整い次第、尋問を直ちに開始します」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、プラズマドライブ室の場所を突き止めて、共謀犯を捕らえ、敵勢力を無力化しました。陛下の準備が整い次第、尋問を直ちに開始します」

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们已经搜查了等离子驱动室，逮捕了一部分破坏分子，消灭了剩下的敌人。如果您愿意出席的话，审讯将即刻开始。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们已经搜查了等离子驱动室，逮捕了一部分破坏分子，消灭了剩下的敌人。如果您愿意出席的话，审讯将即刻开始。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern wurden durchsucht, der Verschwörer wurde gestellt und neutralisiert. Das Verhör wird bald beginnen, wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bereit ist, daran teilzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern wurden durchsucht, der Verschwörer wurde gestellt und neutralisiert. Das Verhör wird bald beginnen, wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bereit ist, daran teilzunehmen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les salles des réacteurs à plasma ont été fouillées et le conspirateur a été appréhendé et neutralisé. Nous procéderons à son interrogatoire dès que Votre Seigneurie nous en aura donné l'ordre. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les salles des réacteurs à plasma ont été fouillées et le conspirateur a été appréhendé et neutralisé. Nous procéderons à son interrogatoire dès que Votre Seigneurie nous en aura donné l'ordre. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, plazma iticisi odaları araştırıldı. Komplocu, tutuklanarak etkisiz hâle getirildi. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri katılmaya hazırsa sorguya birazdan başlayabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the plasma drive chambers have been searched and the conspirator apprehended and neutralised. The interrogation will begin shortly, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to attend."
